Ingredients.1: 1 pound unsweetened baker's chocolate, coarsely chopped

Ingredients.3: 1.5 cups granular sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®)

Directions.1: Line an 8-inch square baking pan with aluminum foil.

Directions.2: Place chocolate in a food processor; pulse until finely chopped.

Directions.3: Pour evaporated milk into a microwave-safe bowl. Stir in sweetener, 1/2 cup at a time, until dissolved. Add vanilla extract. Stir in chopped chocolate.

Directions.4: Heat mixture in the microwave in 30-second intervals, stirring after each interval, until chocolate is melted and smooth, about 2 minutes total. Stir in walnuts.

Directions.5: Spread chocolate mixture in the prepared pan. Refrigerate until firm, about 2 hours. Cut into 1 1/2-inch squares.
